About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself....

Hello! My name is Garrett Katashima and welcome to my page. I am a knowledgeable and proficient web developer who writes clean code. Most of my projects are made with Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap. Seeing the positive influence technology has created in today's world has truly been an amazing experience to witness and I believe I am equipped with the knowledge and tools to contribute.

A side from coding, I spend most of my free time with my family/friends, being outdoors, attending any sport events and most importantly enjoying life.

Have a spot on your team or want to work on projects? Feel free to email me at gkatashima@gmail.com
